Articles.Content:
Specs:

Severity: Low

Frequency: Low

Description: Before this, the rings were not lighting up correctly. It was really pretty but obviously bugged. I don't think this is related to the bug at hand but Im including it here just in case. Anyways I parked my spacecraft inside of the rings, then left the game. When I came back space was gone, and depending on the angle I put the camera back, space would be tinted a different color. This did not effect the map view. The game then decided it was done with this flavor of bug and switched to a view of the rings that was mostly correct. 

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
